titles.title: Your faith can move the mountains

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your faith can move the mountains
Let the Mountains move
We come with expectation
We're waiting here for You, waiting here for You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You're the Lord of all creation
And still You know my heart
The Author of salvation
You've Loved me from the start

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Waiting here for you
With our hands lifted high in praise
And it's You we adore
Singing Hallelujah

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are everything You promised
Your faithfulness is true
And we're Desperate for Your presence
All we need is You

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, Hallelujah
We're singing, Hallelujah
We're singing, Hallelujah
